data.title: Raymond Felton, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Raymond Felton stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Raymond Felton - Points

Raymond Felton scores a career high 35 points (2010)

On November 19, 2010, Raymond Felton set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 35 points in New York's road win against Golden State, 119-125. He also had 5 rebounds, 11 assists, 4 steals and 1 block. He shot 9/10 from two, 4/7 from three, shooting at 76.5% from the field. He also shot 5/6 from the free-throw line.

Raymond Felton - Rebounds

Raymond Felton grabs a career high 11 rebounds (2009)

On January 27, 2009, Raymond Felton tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 11 rebounds in Charlotte's road win against LA Lakers, 110-117. He also had 21 points, 9 assists and 1 block.

Raymond Felton - Assists

Raymond Felton gives a career high 19 assists (2006)

On December 30, 2006, Raymond Felton set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 19 assists in Charlotte's road win against Indiana, 102-113. He also had 10 points, 6 rebounds, 2 steals.

Raymond Felton - Steals

Raymond Felton has a career high 7 steals (2008)

On November 22, 2008, Raymond Felton tied his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 7 steals in Charlotte's home loss against Milwaukee, 74-79. He also had 14 points, 9 rebounds and 5 assists.

Raymond Felton - Blocks

Raymond Felton blocks a career high 3 shots (2003)

On March 24, 2003, Raymond Felton set his career high in blocks in a NCAA game. That day he went for 3 blocks in North Carolina Tar Heels's home win against Wyoming Cowboys, 90-74. He also had 15 points, 1 rebound and 14 assists.

Raymond Felton - Efficiency

Raymond Felton records a career high 46 efficiency rating (2010)

On November 19, 2010, Raymond Felton set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 46 efficiency in New York's road win against Golden State, 119-125. He also had 35 points, 5 rebounds and 11 assists.
